column1: Goesan County (Goesan-gun) is a county in North Chungcheong Province
Sanmagi-yetgilSanmagi-yetgil is a 5 km (3.1 mi) road that extends from Sao-rang-maeul village (Oe-sa-ri
column4: Chungbuk) to Sanmagi village in the mountains. It is a stroll path restored to resemble the traditional mountain road with a picturesque landscape.
